title: Empress's Cascade: Diamond and Emerald 'Addigai' Haaram with South Sea Pearls
materials: South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Exquisite Addigai style necklace featuring a scalloped design embedded with diamonds and interspersed with lush green emeralds. The meticulously crafted pendant showcases intricate diamond filigree work. Finished with a cascade of lustrous South Sea Pearls, adding a touch of traditional Telugu elegance.
occasions: and grand festive occasions like Diwali and Ugadi. A heirloom-worthy piece for any special celebration.
description: A timeless blend of tradition and elegance, this 'Addigai' Haaram is a statement piece crafted with the finest materials and meticulous attention to detail. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and South Sea pearls exudes royalty and sophistication. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a radiant and long-lasting shine, making it a valuable investment for generations to come. Its design honors South Indian heritage while offering a contemporary appeal.
